function.name: microwaveTimer_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the cooking time of the microwave.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the cooking time of the microwave.

cookingTimer.description: The cooking time to be set for the microwave in either minutes or seconds.
